Dashboard.tagline: Your partner in accessible rural healthcare.
Dashboard.findDoctorDescription: Consult with specialists and general physicians.
Dashboard.checkMedicinesDescription: Find local pharmacy stock and prices.
Dashboard.aiSymptomCheckerDescription: Get potential diagnosis based on your symptoms.
Dashboard.emergencyDescription: In case of a critical emergency, you can request a doctor for a home visit. This service is for urgent situations only.
Dashboard.aamAadmiClinicDescription: Find services offered at Aam Aadmi Clinics, including doctor consultations, medicines, and tests.

LanguageSelector.title: Select Your Language
LanguageSelector.description: Please choose your preferred language to continue.

AamAadmiClinic.pageDescription: Access various healthcare services provided at Aam Aadmi Clinics.
AamAadmiClinic.doctorsDescription: View a list of available doctors and their schedules at the clinics.
AamAadmiClinic.medicinesDescription: Check the availability of essential medicines at the clinic pharmacies.
AamAadmiClinic.testsDescription: Get information about the diagnostic tests conducted at the clinics.
AamAadmiClinic.doctorsAtClinicDescription: Find General Physicians available for consultation at the local Aam Aadmi Clinic.
